alert.note: Alert for Boulder And Jefferson Counties Below 6000 Feet, West Broomfield County; Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; Central and South Weld County; Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet; Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County; Morgan County; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County; North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County; Northeast Weld County; Washington County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 07 at 6:21AM MST until March 07 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Freezing drizzle ongoing. Ice accumulations around a light glaze. * WHERE...I-25 Urban Corridor and adjacent plains into portions of northeast Colorado. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads, and bridges are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org.
